Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController

Class TableController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SubSceneController.TableController
All Implemented Interfaces:
TableListener, Listener, UI
public class TableController extends GUIController implements TableListener
A sub-scene controller. It manages how GUI shows LocalTable and handles mouse clicks by user.

  • Constructor Details

    • TableController

      public TableController(GUIController controller)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes GridPane with which TableController shows cards on table (resources, gold and goals) and decks. It manages, also, listeners for width and height values.

    • buildTable

      private void buildTable()
      Effectively builds and fill gridPane containing all cards and decks. Clicking the card (on table or on deck), the user can pick it. Dimensions of the cards are bound to the stage width and height. Cards on table are unswappable.

    • handleClickDrawableTableCard

      private void handleClickDrawableTableCard(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, PlayableCard card, int position)
      Handles user click on a card visible on table
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent describing the mouse click event
      card - the PlayableCard to be picked
      position - the position of the card on table

    • handleClickDrawableDeck

      private void handleClickDrawableDeck(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, PlayableCardType type)
      Handles user click on a deck card
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent describing the mouse click event
      type - the PlayableCardType of the card to be picked

    • drawableCardFactory

      private void drawableCardFactory(PlayableCard card, int x, int y)
      Factory method for drawable cards. Manages listeners for button click.
      Parameters:
      card - the PlayableCard to be picked
      x - x position on the grid
      y - y position on the grid

    • factoryUpperDeckCard

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView factoryUpperDeckCard()
      Factory method for ImageView of card on top of goal cards deck
      Returns:
      ImageView of the card on top of deck

    • factoryUpperDeckCard

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView factoryUpperDeckCard(Symbol symbol, PlayableCardType type)
      Factory method for ImageView of cards on top of playable cards decks (resource and gold)
      Parameters:
      symbol - the Symbol of the card
      type - the PlayableCardType of the card
      Returns:
      the ImageView built.

    • notify

      public void notify(LocalTable localTable)
      Used to notify TableController about updates on LocalTable.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface TableListener
      Parameters:
      localTable - the LocalTable that has changed.

    • clipCardImage

      Parameters:
